--------------------
Text: OC Transpo Route 4 is a crosstown bus route operated by OC Transpo in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, that runs between Hurdman Station and the Rideau Centre in downtown Ottawa.

Triplets:<OC Transpo Route 4

--------------------
Text: OC Transpo Route 4:  All trips also serve Carleton University.

Text: OC Transpo Route 4:  Just like route 11, the route is not recognized as a rapid transit route by OC Transpo.
